Name: Missingno, the Corrupting Boon
RulesText:
When {CARDNAME} enters the battlefield, and at the beginning of your upkeep, discard two cards at random. Put a +1/+1 counter on {CARDNAME} for each card discarded.

At the beginning of your upkeep, create X copies of target artifact token you control where X is 128 minus your current number of copies.

Name: Divine Intervention
RulesText:
{CARDNAME} enters the battlefield with two intervention counters on it.

At the beginning of your upkeep, remove an intervention counter from {CARDNAME}. Then if there are none left, the game is a draw.
FlavorText: I mean, come on.

Name: Loxodon Gifting Rites
RulesText:
Digress with 10 life and -
* Before the subgame, players do a white elephant draft to pick which player's sublibrary to use. Drafting goes in turn order, starting with the player after you. 
* The winner creates 5 treasure tokens; all other players lose 5 life.

Name: Mine's Under Warranty?
RulesText:
Choose one -
* Put target card from your graveyard on top of your library.
* Move all pieces of target ripped up card in exile to the absolutely-removed-from-the-\\freaking-game-forever zone. Create a copy of that card and put it on top of your library.
Then shuffle, scry 3, and draw a card.

Name: Pilgrim's Contest
RulesText: Fateclash with target opponent. Each time a coin comes up heads, the flipping player gains 2 life.
FlavorText: Ultimate humility showdown!

Name: Production Mishap
RulesText: Counter target spell. Its controller shuffles their library and reveals the top card. If possible, that player casts the revealed card without paying its mana cost.
FlavorText: There's been a mix-up at the factory!

Name: Salamé
RulesText: Target player cannot attack you this turn. At the end of this turn, gain 1 life for each untapped creature that player controls. During your next turn, that player may pay {3} to copy this spell and choose new targets. (Copies of this spell can be copied by their targets.)
FlavorText: Go into the light, until we meet again.

Name: Shahrazad
RulesText: Digress. Non-winning players lose half their life, rounded up.
FlavorText: When I was your age television was called books. And this is a special book.

Name: Stunt Performers Guild
RulesText:
Flash, first strike
Whenever an opponent would toss a card, you may toss that card instead.
FlavorText: This one's going to be a hit, but maybe not with the target audience.

Name: Wheat Knight
RulesText:
First strike
When a creature dies that was damaged by Wheat Knight this turn, shuffle that creature into its owner's library.
{2},{T}, Sacrifice Wheat Knight: Gain 3 life.
Sacrifice a food: Regenerate Wheat Knight.

Name: Bazaahrazad
RulesText:
Digress with 10 life and - 
* Whenever a land enters the battlefield, its controller flips a coin. If tails, that land becomes Gem Bazaar.
* All non-Gem-Bazaar lands have “{T}: Draw 2 cards, then discard 3 cards.”
* The winner shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library and draws 7 cards.

Name: Buried in Time
RulesText: Shuffle up to 3 creatures into their owner's libraries.
FlavorText: Not today.

Name: Chickensayswhat?
RulesText: If an opponent says the word "what" while {CARDNAME} is on the stack, exile target creature or planeswalker that player controls. That player creates a 0/1 blue bird token. Do this only once per player. If no opponent says "what", create a 0/1 blue bird token.

Name: Clamburgalar
RulesText:
When Clamburgalar deals damage to a player, create a food and a treasure token.
Sacrifice a food: Clamburgalar is unblockable until end of turn. Target opponent gains 3 life.
Sacrifice 3 treasures: Gain control of target permanent until Clamburgalar leaves the battlefield.

Name: Gateway Drug
RulesText: {T}, Sacrifice {CARDNAME}: Put a meta counter on target creature.
FlavorText:
"Remember, all I'm offering is the truth. Nothing more. "
- Morpheus

Name: Mental Clash
RulesText: Fateclash with target opponent. Each time a coin comes up heads, the flipping player draws a card.
FlavorText: The battle of wits has begun.

Name: Proponent of Ambidexterity
RulesText:
You may choose not to untap {CARDNAME} during your untap step. 
{T}: As long as {CARDNAME} remains tapped, target player may not toss cards with target hand.

Name: Quit to Get Ahead
RulesText: Target player loses the current subgame. When the supergame resumes it is the beginning of that player's turn. That player draws 2 extra cards during their draw step that turn. (You may not cast this spell if not in a subgame.)

Name: Timetwister
RulesText: Each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library, then draws seven cards. (Then put {CARDNAME} into its owner's graveyard.)

Name: Booster Box Tutor Lich
RulesText:
Gain life equal to the number of untapped lands you control.
Open a sealed Magic booster, choose a card, and put it into your hand.
You may pay X life to put up to 3 permanents with a total mana value of X from your hand onto the battlefield.
Epic

Name: Cinnibar Expedition
RulesText: Search your library for a creature with flying, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
Rules2: Search your library for an Island, put it into the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
Rules3: Put a copy of Missingno, the Corrupting Boon you own from anywhere onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

Name: Descend into Madness
RulesText: Reveal the top two cards of target player's library, and put the first in their graveyard. If both cards have the same name, or the first card's name is alphabetically after the second card's name, repeat this process with the same player.

Name: Fool's Contest
RulesText: Fateclash with target opponent. Each time a coin comes up tails, the flipping player discards a card.
FlavorText: Let's forget our differences.

Name: Martyr Drill
RulesText: Digress with 5 life.\\ All losing players gain 10 life.
FlavorText: Pain is temporary.

Name: Piercing Gaze
RulesText:
When you and target opponent are ready, count to 3, then begin a staring contest while continuing to play Magic. When a player loses the staring contest, the winner chooses one -
* The loser discards 2 cards.
* The loser loses 3 life and the winner gains 3 life.

Name: Replicating Orb
RulesText: {1},{T}, Sacrifice {CARDNAME}: Toss {CARDNAME}. All permanents it touches become copies of {CARDNAME}.
FlavorText: The orbs themselves aren't so bad, it's really the lack of non-orbs you need to watch out for.

Name: Thirst for Power
RulesText:
Add three mana of any one color.
You lose 2 life.
FlavorText: You get to drink from the firehose!

Name: Unnatural Gravity
RulesText: The height you must toss cards\\from is reduced by one half.
FlavorText: The sky is falling.

Name: Chahrazad
RulesText:
Flying
{R}: {CARDNAME} gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
When {CARDNAME} enters the battlefield digress with -
* Whenever a player successfully casts a creature spell, they may put a dragon card they own from outside the game into the battlefield. Exile those dragons if they leave the battlefield. 
* {CARDNAME} deals damage equal to its power to non-winning players.

Name: Double or Nothing
Eversplosion
RulesText: You and target opponent each reveal the top card of your libraries, choose a target permanent controlled by the other player, and toss your revealed cards. Re-toss until both tosses are valid. Destroy any permanents touched by either card, and put the tossed cards in their owners' graveyards. If either target permanent was not destroyed and both players still control at least one permanent, repeat this process.

Name: Falling Star
RulesText: Toss {CARDNAME}. It deals 3 damage to each creature it touches. Tap those creatures.

Name: First Strike
RulesText:
Digress with 1 life and -
* Players start with 3-card hands.
* {CARDNAME} deals 6 damage to any target, chosen by the winner.
FlavorText: This will just take a second.

Name: Jugglehaups
RulesText: For each artifact, creature, and land, flip a coin. If tails, destroy that permanent; it cannot be regenerated.
FlavorText:
"Never had one lesson!"
- Ferris, the Truant

Name: Krark's Trampoline
RulesText: If you would toss a card, instead toss two cards and ignore one.
FlavorText: Double bouncing allowed.

Name: Mana Clash
RulesText: Fateclash with target opponent. Each time a coin comes up tails, {CARDNAME} deals one damage to the flipping player.

Name: Membership Dues
RulesText:
Split second
Take the last card that was put into another player's hand, and is still in that player's hand, and put it into your hand.
Until that card leaves your hand, you may replace {W}, {U}, {B}, or {G} in its cost with {R}{R} or 2 life, any number of times per turn.
FlavorText: "Smokes. Let's go."

Name: Ascend to Greatness
RulesText: Reveal the top two cards of target player's library, and put the first in their hand. If both cards have the same name, or the first card's name is alphabetically before the second card's name, repeat this process with the same player.

Name: Fountain of Brawndo
RulesText:
{G},{T}: Create a food token.
{T}, Sacrifice two foods: Search your library for a basic land, put it into play tapped, then shuffle.
FlavorText: It's what plants crave!

Name: Gelatenous Shambler
RulesText:
{CARDNAME} enters the battlefield with one +1/+1 counter.
At the beginning of your upkeep, roll a d6 and put that many +1/+1 counters on {CARDNAME}.
Sacrifice a food: Create a 0/0 green ooze warrior token and move any number of +1/+1 counters from Gelatenous\\Shambler to it.

Name: Land Rush
RulesText: Fateclash with target opponent. Each time a coin comes up heads, the flipping player searches their library for a basic land and puts it into play tapped. After the last flip, both players shuffle their libraries.

Name: Midas Orb
RulesText: {T}, Sacrifice {CARDNAME}: Toss {CARDNAME}. Any permanents it touches lose all types and abilities and become treasure artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color."

Name: More Pieces, More Meat
RulesText: Destroy target creature. Its controller chooses its power or toughness, and creates that many 1/1 green boar tokens with "When this creature dies, create a food token."

Name: Nature's Game
RulesText:
Digress with 10 life and -
* At the beginning of each player's upkeep, they roll a d6.
1-2 | Create a 3/3 green beast token.
3-4 | Search your library for a basic land, put it into play tapped, then shuffle.
5 | Sacrifice an artifact, enchantment, or land.
6 | Lose 3 life.
* The winner may search their library for a creature, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

Name: Splendid Genesis
RulesText: Shuffle all cards in the game together and deal them into three decks. The game continues with a new player.

Name: Yavimaya Potluck
RulesText:
Each player reveals the top card of their library and creates a number of food tokens equal to that card's mana value.
Until end of turn, activated abilities of your foods cost {1} less.

Name: Anachronist
RulesText:
~ gets +1/+1 if equipped.
When ~ deals combat damage to a player, choose target permament they control and search their library for a card of the same type. If you find one, put it into the battlefield under their control and shuffle the target permanent into its owner's library.
FlavorText: In three dimensions they are called smugglers. \\In four, anachronists.

Name: Change of Venue
RulesText:
Digress with -
* A game other than Magic.
* Non-winning players lose half their life, rounded up.
FlavorText: ERRATA: Our legal department informs us that any game which may be in violation of the law, human decency, or common sense is banned from digressification.

Name: Chaos Oreo
RulesText:
All foods have "{1},{T}, Sacrifice this permanent: Toss this card and destroy any permanents it touches."

{2},{T}, Sacrifice Chaos Oreo: Gain 3 life.
FlavorText: All shall crumble.

Name: Grifting Megalodon
RulesText:
Hexproof, meta
Whenever you lose a game, put a loss counter on {CARDNAME}.
Whenever you win a game, remove all loss counters from {CARDNAME}.
Sacrifice ~: You win. Activate this ability only if there are 3 or more loss counters on ~.

Name: Hat-Trick Elemental
RulesText:
Haste, trample, meta
Whenever you win a game, put a win counter on {CARDNAME}.
Whenever you lose a game, remove all win counters from {CARDNAME}.
Sacrifice ~: You win. Activate this ability only if there are 3 or more win counters on ~.

Name: Impactful Wish
RulesText: Choose an oversized card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand. That card counts as Chaos Orb. If that card would be put into a graveyard or library, exile it.
FlavorText: Think big.

Name: MBEAST
RulesText:
Trample, dredge 3, affinity for beasts and lhurgoyfs

{CARDNAME}'s power and toughness are equal to the number of M's in the names of cards in all graveyards. (Ignoring capitalization)

When {CARDNAME} enters the battlefield, toss it and shout its name. If the toss is successful, for each permanent it touches, destroy that permanent and its controller mills 2 cards. If no permanents are destroyed, {CARDNAME} deals damage equal to its power to you.

Name: Master of None
RulesText: If you control 10 permanents with alternate win, lose, or draw conditions, you win.
FlavorText: Every strategy is a strategy.

Name: Meteoric Rise
RulesText:
When you toss a card, choose a target permanent. If the tossed card touches the target, put a dexterity counter on {CARDNAME}.

If {CARDNAME} has 10 or more dexterity counters, you win.

Name: Narcoleptic Hellkite
RulesText:
Flying
Whenever {CARDNAME} attacks, toss it and destroy any artifacts or creatures it touches. If any permanents are destroyed this way, remove {CARDNAME} from combat.

Name: Never-Ending Story
RulesText:
Meta
If there are 5 open games, you win.
FlavorText: Some people started reading it, not knowing what it was.

Name: Oracle of Tropes
RulesText:
Meta
{CARDNAME}'s power and toughness are equal to the number of open games.
Instants and sorceries in your graveyards in all open games have "Flashback X", where X is that card's mana cost, including color.
You may play flashback abilities of cards in other open games.

Name: Path More Traveled
RulesText:
When {CARDNAME} enters the battlefield, put a group of life counters on it for each player, where the number of counters in each group is that player's life total.
Whenever a player gains life or loses life, add or remove that many life counters from the group for that player, respectively.
If the only group with 1 or more life counters is yours, you win.

Name: Timekeeper
RulesText:
~ gets +1/+1 if equipped.
Whenever ~ deals combat damage to a player, put it on top of your library. Then each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library, and draws seven cards.
FlavorText: When help is needed, he'll be then.

Name: Wishing Fisher
RulesText: {G/U},{T}: Name a card, then reveal the top card of your library. If the revealed card was not the named card, put it into your graveyard; otherwise, put it into your hand and repeat this process.
FlavorText: I fish what I wish.

Name: Xavier, Renegade Angel
RulesText:
Meta
{4}{G/W}{G/W},{T}: Each player sacrifices a permanent, then shuffles up to 3 cards from their graveyard into their library. Digress with 10 life.
FlavorText: What doth life?

Name: Almanac of Spoilers
RulesText:
Affinity for subgames, meta
{T}: Any opponent may digress. If they do, shuffle {CARDNAME} into its owner's library. Otherwise, exile it and fateclash with target opponent. After each flip, if only one coin comes up heads, the player who flipped heads wins the game. If both coins come up heads or tails, the game is a draw.

Name: Black Lotus
RulesText:
{T}, Sacrifice {CARDNAME}: 
Add three mana of any one color.

Name: Blow-up-the-Engines Button
RulesText:
When ~ enters the battlefield, choose a target permanent.
When ~ is destroyed, destroy the targeted permanent.

{2},{T}, Sacrifice {CARDNAME}: Gain 3 life.
FlavorText: Who but some dumb kids would put a blow-up-the-engines button on a ship?

Name: Chaos Orb
RulesText: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice {CARDNAME}:\\Toss {CARDNAME} and destroy any non-token permanents it touches.

Name: Krark's Thumb
RulesText: If you would flip a coin, instead flip two coins and ignore one.
FlavorText:
"I can think of one goblin it ain't so lucky for."
-Slobad, goblin tinkerer

Name: Magnetic Orb
RulesText:
Crew 1
{1},{T}: Toss {CARDNAME}. For each non-token permanent it touches, exile that permanent, put it under {CARDNAME}, and put a +1/+1 counter on {CARDNAME}.

When {CARDNAME} leaves the battlefield, return all permanents exiled by it to the battlefield.

Name: Mana Crypt
RulesText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, {CARDNAME} deals 3 damage to you.
{T}: Add {C}{C}.
FlavorText: At first they thought the vault was empty. Then the walls began to glow.

Name: Shrine of the Silver Monkey
RulesText: {T}, Sacrifice {CARDNAME}: Choose a creature and land you control. Without standing up, target opponent tosses {CARDNAME}, the creature, and the land. That player starts a timer for 10 seconds. Stack {CARDNAME}, the creature, and the land on the battlefield, in that order. If you finish before the timer ends, draw 3 cards.

Name: Spinning Totem
RulesText:
Meta
{2},{T}, Sacrifice Spinning Totem: The current game ends in a draw. No players lose life as a result. Activate this ability only in a subgame.
FlavorText: When you look at your totem, you know beyond a doubt you're not in someone else's dream.

Name: Tutor Booster
RulesText: Whenever a player searches\\for cards, they search for\\one additional card.
FlavorText: More of whatever you desire.

Name: Wit Engine
FlavorText: "Om" is said to be the perfect sound of the universe, but not when you say it like this:

Name: Zirilan's Claw
RulesText:
{1}, Sacrifice an artifact: Roll a d6. 
1-3 | (Better luck next time.)
4-5 | Create a treasure token.
6 | Search your library for a creature, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. 
Any player may activate this ability.

Name: Bazaar of Baghdad
RulesText:
{T}: Draw 2 cards,
then discard 3 cards.

Name: Gem Bazaar
RulesText:
When {CARDNAME} enters the battlefield, choose a random color.
{T}: Add one mana of the last color chosen. Then choose a random color.

Name: Myst
RulesText:
{CARDNAME} enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add one mana of any color. Put a page counter of that color on {CARDNAME}.
If there are 4 page counters of the same color on Myst, you lose.

Name: Wild
RulesText:
{T}: Flip a coin. If you win, choose a color; otherwise, target opponent chooses a color. Add one mana of that color.

You may play {CARDNAME} as a copy of any card by paying its mana cost. You must also pay life equal to its mana value, or 2, whichever is greater.

Name: Boar
RulesText: When this creature dies,\\create a food token.
FlavorText: "I'm a wild pig!"

Name: Food
RulesText: {2},{T}, Sacrifice this artifact:\\Gain 3 life.

Name: Treasure
RulesText: {T}, Sacrifice this artifact:\\Add one mana of any color.
